articles.title: Lawrence Dallaglio column: Steve Borthwick passion play vital to set England World Cup tone
articles.description: Red Roses coach must strike the right emotional pitch to inspire his players before Saturday’s pivotal Pool D opener against Argentina
articles.content:
E ngland must connect the head and the heart to be able to beat Argentina in their Rugby World Cup opener on Saturday.
Steve Borthwick does not show his emotion physically, but I know the England head coach, I played with him – and he feels and cares... [3242 chars]

articles.title: England vs Argentina: Dan Cole crucial in bid to combat Pumas’ Bajada scrum system
articles.description: Steve Borthwick’s side must contain their Pool D rivals’ unorthodox and hugely powerful set-piece in key Marseille opener
articles.content:
D an Cole’s comic timing brought the house down, but the veteran England tight-head prop knows there are no jokes about Argentina’s scrum.
As the 36-year-old was quizzed on the Pumas’ set-piece, a heavy goods vehicle chugged past the England team hot... [4313 chars]

articles.title: Do England have what it takes to tackle Argentina?
articles.description: The QBE Predictor puts England among the favourites to win the Rugby World Cup
articles.content: T here is some good news for England as they head into their opening Rugby World Cup match with Argentina tomorrow. The QBE Predictor has made them third favourites to win the tournament in France, despite a shaky run of results that saw them lose th... [1772 chars]

articles.title: Maro Itoje backs England to rise to World Cup occasion: ‘We know who we are’
articles.description: Saracens lock is confident of beating Argentina in Saturday’s crucial Pool D opener despite a woeful warm-up campaign
articles.content:
B ullish Maro Itoje has insisted that England will reveal their true identity to dispatch Argentina and start their Rugby World Cup campaign in style.
An energised Itoje declared, “we know who we are” when challenged on how England can be so confiden... [2583 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi strikes as Argentina beat Ecuador in opening World Cup qualifier
articles.description: Lionel Messi’s second-half goal gave Argentina a 1-0 home win over Ecuador to get the world champions’ qualifying campaign for the 2026 finals off to a positive start
articles.content:
Lionel Messi’s second-half goal gave Argentina a 1-0 home win over Ecuador on Thursday to get the world champions’ qualifying campaign for the 2026 finals off to a positive start.
Argentina were dominant in possession but frustrated in attack as they... [1098 chars]

articles.title: Messi scores from a free kick to give Argentina 1-0 win in South American World Cup qualifying
articles.description: Lionel Messi scored from a free kick in the 78th minute to give Argentina a 1-0 win against Ecuador in the first round of South American World Cup qualifying.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Once again, and now as a World Cup champion, Lionel Messi came to Argentina’s rescue when the team most needed him.
The 36-year-old captain scored from a free kick in the 78th minute to give Argentina a 1-0 win against ... [2456 chars]

articles.title: Battling Cancer at a Young Age, Argentine Fan Gets Dreams Fulfilled by Lionel Messi's Teammate With a Wholesome Gesture
articles.description: Lionel Messi's Argentina teammate Enzo Fernandez made a kind gesture, meeting a young River Plate fan with cancer and had a picture with him.

articles.title: Lionel Messi scores insane free-kick to inspire Argentina to 1-0 win v Ecuador
articles.description: Messi produces yet another moment of magic in Argentina's 2026 World Cup qualifier vs Ecuador
articles.content: Lionel Messi scored a superb free-kick to inspire Argentina to a hard-fought 1-0 victory over Ecuador during Thursday night’s 2026 World Cup qualifier. The South American nations went head-to-head in Buenos Aires, and it was Messi - yet again - who p... [2886 chars]
